title: WTB/WTTF: T216's in any condition, raw or graded.
author: Kotton King

posts.post_title: WTB/WTTF: T216's in any condition, raw or graded.
posts.post_content:
Title says it all.  

I'm on the hunt for these elusive cards.  

Specifically I'm looking for any T216's of players I don't already have.  Any condition and they can be graded or raw.

Looking for examples with any of the three backs: Kotton, MINO, and Virginia Extra.

If you have something available send me an email: [url]crazylocomerk@yahoo.com[/url]

Will buy or trade (I've got a few type cards available to use as trade bait).

Thanks for looking.

Bump, since I missed another :(

Always looking to add to my set.

Will buy or trade.
